meanings.definition: To arrange for compensation in the event of damage or loss.
meanings.sent1: She insures her car to protect it from accidents.
meanings.sent2: He always insures his valuable items against theft.
meanings.sent3: Insuring her phone was a smart move after dropping it in water last time.
meanings.sent4: Insuring your future success with hard work is like planting seeds for a fruitful harvest.
meanings.sent5: Insuring your health with regular exercise can lead to a longer, happier life.

meanings.sent1: They insure their employees to ensure their well-being.
meanings.sent2: It is important to insure your property against natural disasters.
meanings.sent3: Insuring their pet for unexpected vet bills brought them peace of mind.
meanings.sent4: Insuring your travels with travel insurance is like having a safety net.
meanings.sent5: Insuring your belongings before a move can save you from financial loss.

meanings.definition: To make certain that something will happen.
meanings.sent1: Studying hard insures good grades in school.
meanings.sent2: Double-checking the details insures a successful event.
meanings.sent3: Insuring a sunny day for the picnic, they brought umbrellas just in case.
meanings.sent4: Insuring a smooth journey through life requires patience and perseverance.
meanings.sent5: Insuring a positive outcome by preparing well in advance is a wise decision.
